thread.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Custom Cell-Phone Case (NJD-960)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Inventor Develops Custom Cell-Phone Case (NJD-960)

author: Gia DelliGatti
title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Custom Cell-Phone Case (NJD-960)
text:
"I wanted a way to make my cell phone stand out and look different from everyone else's," said an inventor from Doyton, N.J. "I came up with this case as a fun way to customize and personalize my phone." She developed the EZ KUSTOM KASE to add a decorative touch to any cell phone. The case features a distinctive, novelty design that serves as a conversation piece. The unit protects the phone from damages if dropped. It is adaptable for use with virtually any cell phone. Furthermore, the case is easy to put on and take off.
The original design was submitted to the New Jersey office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-NJD-960, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
